comments.author: tweetious
comments.body: Quote from: raritycheck on July 17, 2022, 04:40:09 PMQuote from: Hookzup1 on July 17, 2022, 03:34:25 PMWhere are these shipped from ?Shipping cost added to the postIf I understood this correctly, Hookzup1 question (and also mine) has to do with the country from where those will be dispatched (and not particularly with the shipping costs involved).Depending on the country that the buyer is located, there might be required additional import fees to be paid (by the buyer), when importing items from overseas. Hence, bidders might want to take into account those fees in their total, when placing bids.Hence, it will be helpful if you could please indicate the continent (at least) from where you will dispatch those items (if you do not want specifically to indicate a country). In case you dispatch them from Europe, an indication of EU (or not) will help too.Thanks
